title: Something's Coming...
content:

@@ @@

[[image https://i.imgur.com/8HK2Ifo.png]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[collapsible show="+ Artist commentary" hide="- Closer..."]]
A little project I started back in July for a fun Halloween drawing. Part of this was done to explore my lineless style more, part of this was to draw something spooky, but the majority of this was to show my appreciation for the HARBINGER II series, one of my favorite projects to come out of the wiki recently. I remember being absolutely in love with it back in 2021 and eagerly awaiting each new installment and frequently trying (and failing) to guess who the author was. It's a really fun read, and I highly recommend anyone who hasn't to check it out. There will be links to each article in the collapsible if you click on the image.

I was considering doing a sequel to this next year and drawing every [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-anthology-hub Anthology] article, but [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/saltywater-art someone already beat me to that]. I might still do it though...
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Individual images and credits" hide ="- Closer..."]]
